DOC.detailed_description: The aim study twofold . The first aim evaluate new MRI technique develop investigator protocol human volunteer . The second aim assist investigator need use MR image obtain device research . MR image and/or spectroscopy data acquire participant protocol .
DOC.criteria: Healthy normal volunteer image protocol optimization .
